definition: to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together

sentences.english: And cloud son still refused to conspiracy with him, refuse to speak a second opinion.
sentences.chinese: 而云子還是不肯跟他鬥智鬥勇，不肯講一句實話。

sentences.english: I usually elect to play mind games with any suspected fish before beginning a new drift.
sentences.chinese: 我通常選擇於開始一次新飄流前跟可疑的魚兒鬥鬥智。

sentences.english: Bidding is a battle of wits, and landscape engineering projects make no exceptions as well.
sentences.chinese: 投標報價是一個鬥智的過程，園林工程項目也不例外。

sentences.english: It took him a few minutes to get his wits back.
sentences.chinese: 它把他幾分鐘讓他鬥智鬥勇回來。

sentences.english: Its beams bear colored paintings illustrating the story about Sun Bin and Pang Juan.
sentences.chinese: 榭內橫樑上彩繪歷史上著名的“孫龐鬥智”故事。

sentences.english: In order to save the Village Chief, Goku must match strength and wits against General White.
sentences.chinese: 要想救出村長，小悟空必須和白將軍鬥智鬥勇一番。

sentences.english: My personal temperament is that I like protecting victims and I like to engage in intellectual combat.
sentences.chinese: 從個性上說，我喜歡保護受害者，喜歡鬥智。

sentences.english: The gang members are playing a cat-and mouse game.
sentences.chinese: 幫派人員在玩弄鬥智施暴的玩藝兒。

sentences.english: This is a story about military strategy and tactics, with some counterintuitive twists and turns.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個關於軍隊鬥智鬥勇的故事，包含跌宕與起伏。

sentences.english: Penguin Generals always win in a battle of wits .
sentences.chinese: 企鵝將軍始終贏得鬥智周旋。

definition: to endure humiliation as part of an important mission (idiom); to suffer in silence
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
to be unable to withstand a single blow/to collapse at the first blow
not much to choose between the two/tweedledum and tweedledee
lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
to find joy in sorrows (idiom); to enjoy sth in spite of one's suffering
to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
